game.name: Chip 'N Dale Rescue Rangers - Remastered
game.desc: Disney's Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers: Remastered - A re-release of a game based on the animated series Chip and Dale rush to the rescue. The walkthrough offers single-player and two-player co-op. Taking control of the main character, the player begins a rescue mission. Need to locate a lost kitten. As the operation progresses, the central characters are drawn into more serious trouble and intrigue.
